creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
description: sterling silver spoon; handle is a triple column terminated at both ends by a larger disk with beaded edge, end of handle in the shape of a spade medallion with an image of a bird standing on the edge of its nest filled with eggs
markings: on back of bowl near handle: [STERLING 1]; on back of spade medallion at end of handle, script: [FHL]
object_name: Spoon, from a child's dinner set
title: Spoon, from a child's dinner set
